markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Changeling Exile](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2877)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This changeling exile is the child of a cuckoo hag.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Changeling_Exile.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Changeling Exile](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2877)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=552" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Wildsong](/Languages.aspx?ID=116)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +11 

+2 circumstance to all saves vs. [dream](/Traits.aspx?ID=582) and [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claws +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +11 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Ignition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1565), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Tangle Vine](/Spells.aspx?ID=1713)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153), [Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)

**Druid Order Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 21
- **2nd**
[Untamed Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1861), [Untamed Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=1862)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-381" />
name: Changeling Exile
